span.div: Need to enroll a new student?

h1.span: COVID -19 Information for Jackson R-2 Families

span.h1: COVID-19 Information for Jackson R-2 Families

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The district is implementing continuous learning opportunities for all students. Preschool and elementary teachers will use regular electronic communications through Seesaw or Google Classroom to engage our students in activities and learning. Our goal is to provide face to face interactions between teachers and students through technology. Students K-4 should have picked up their iPad or Chromebooks, including a charger, school supplies, and/or a packet of supplemental learning materials from their buildings by this time. If you have not, please email your building principal or call 243-9501.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Fifth through twelfth-grade students will complete assignments primarily through Canvas. Teachers will began contacting students on Friday, March 20th, and started posting assignments on Monday, March 23rd. Please continue to check your email. We have designated specific days for each content area.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;
list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;
list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;
list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;
list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

ul.li: Friday- Fine Arts, Foreign Language, PE/Health

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: inherit;

p.span: Advisory teachers will also be contacting their students to answer questions and ensure they have any needed resources. Students, if you are having issues with Canvas, please email Danna Bruns at

a.style: font-size: 12pt; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-family: Arial;

p.span: If your 5th-12th grade student is currently without a Chromebook, contact Jason Bruns or call 243-9501. If your student is in need of Chromebook repair, please email Jason Bruns at jbruns@jr2mail.org to make arrangements.

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 18px;
span.strong: Answers to Frequently Asked Questions during the COVID - 19 School Closure

span.style: font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-family: Arial;

p.a: Jackson High School Frequently Asked Questions
Jackson Middle School Frequently Asked Questions
Jackson Junior High School Frequently Asked Questions

span.style: font-size: 18px;

span.p: Jackson R-2 Open Kindergarten Enrollment night scheduled for Thursday, March 19, 2020 has been CANCELLED due to the COVID-19 situation.

However, we are still enrolling new students for the 20/21 academic year even during the district closure. Please complete this online form and the district office will contact you to complete the enrollment. Thank you for your patience and cooperation during this time.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

span.span: Charter Communications will offer free Spectrum broadband and Wi-Fi access for 60 days to households with K-12 and/or college students who do not already have a Spectrum broadband subscription at any service level up to 100 Mbps. To order call

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: #ffff00; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

span.span: . Installation fees will be waived for new student households.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

span.span: AT&T is also offering reduced and reduced Internet services to low-income families. Click here for details.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The District is also boosting Wi-Fi coverage to extend into school parking lots. Students and parents can visit their school’s parking lot to access the District's network (a coverage map for each school can be found below).

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

span.p: Meals will be made available for Jackson R-2 students beginning Monday, March 23rd. Meal pick ups may be made between 8-10 AM Mondays and Thursdays at our elementary and JMS locations. Monday meals will consist of three days of breakfast and lunch, and Thursday pickups will contain two days of breakfast and lunch. If a family has multiple children, pickups can be made at one site.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: Students who participate in our weekend Power Pack meal program will receive their Power Packs on Thursdays when they pick up their daily food packs.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: If families have difficulty picking meals up, please contact the Board Office at 243-9501.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: inherit;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: At this moment, all athletics and activities are postponed.
